entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. Peters Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 3:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -18.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -21.5°C
Wind: W 45 km/h gust 62 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over exposed areas. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over exposed areas this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
